alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and west central Putnam Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rochelle, or 10 miles southwest of Melrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Melrose, Hawthorne, Rochelle and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
